name.es: Colaboración de McDonald’s × Pokémon Happy Meals
name.ja: マクドナルド × ポケモン ハッピーミール コラボレーション
name.pt: Colaboração McDonald’s × Pokémon no McLanche Feliz
name.zh: 麥當勞 × Pokémon 開心樂園餐合作

description.en: Pokémon fans can grab a 4-card Pokémon TCG booster and a fun sticker sheet with every Happy Meal! Plus, if you're in the US, order a Happy Meal through the McDonald's app to get 24 pack hourglasses and 12 wonder hourglasses in Pokémon Trading Card Game Pocket.
description.ja: アメリカのみで利用可能
